character.name: Kelly Kapoor
character.description: No, we would not want to share a cubicle row with Mindy Kaling’s ditzy, boy-crazy motormouth (poor Toby!), but from a safe distance, she was absolute comedy gold. Her on-again, off-again romance with Ryan was a reliable source of laughs — and judging by the prevalence of memes featuring her, we’re just starting to fully appreciate her genius.
